name: Do Not Go Gentle
description:
WARNING FLASHING LIGHTS 

If you have Thanatophobia and/or Chronophobia I highly suggest not playing this.

Use WASD and Mouse to move/look

This game is less of a game and more of an art piece that I've made about my own struggles with accepting the inevitability of death. 

Made for FSU Fall Game Jam 2021

Level Design, Particle Effects, Shaders, Lighting, Animations, Narrative and Programming by Tori Croteau

Music by Gabe DeBenedict

SFX:
